author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 60-year-old woman, who was fetching water from a tanker, was crushed to death and three others were injured when a local man, who was allegedly in an inebriated condition, suddenly took the vehicle in reverse at RS Madai near here on Tuesday.

Police said that some women were fetching water from the tanker when the local man, G. Subbu, developed a wordy duel with driver Govindan (40).

Subbu pushed Mr. Govindan down from his seat and started the vehicle in reverse.

As the lorry suddenly came in reverse and ran over a two-wheeler, the women and the cleaner, who was helping the women, ran helter skelter. Kunjrammal fell down in the commotion and was crushed to death, the police said.

Two other women were injured and admitted to Government District Headquarters Hospital here.

Mr. Govindan was also admitted to the hospital with injuries.

The police arrested Subbu and produced him in a local court, which remanded him in judicial custody.
title: Woman killed as drunk man moves tanker in reverse
